overview:
Steve Dispensa is the co-founder and CTO of PhoneFactor. He is responsible for the overall strategic direction of the firm’s technology, as well as managing engineering and technical operations.

Prior to founding PhoneFactor, Steve was Director of Network and Systems Architecture at Sprint’s Broadband Wireless Group, where he was responsible for design, implementation, and operation of the world’s first wireless broadband Internet access service.

Steve holds a number of US patents in computer and networking-related fields, and has several others pending. He is Cisco CCIE #5444 and a 6-time Microsoft MVP supporting the Windows Kernel driver development community.
